item.title: Report X-2024110294
item.description:
Report X-2024110294

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-30
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1. X-2024110294 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A REPSONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FUTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT. 2. X-2024110295 LEAKING PLASTIC DRUM WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WERE PUT ON AND DRUM WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. DRUM WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND DRUM WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report X-2024110103
item.description:
Report X-2024110103

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-08T12:22:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-04
  • City: SPOKANE
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 11/4/2024 at approximately 1015, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 240946 at the station location in Spokane, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of 4 plastic bottles, packaged in a fiberboard box. The shipment was discovered emitting an odor during sort. Further investigation revealed a stain along the bottom of the box. Upon examining the inner contents, one of the bottles appeared damp around the closure. A safety data sheet found inside of the packaging classified the commodity as UN3082. It appears the shipment was tendered under IATA Special Provisions A197; however, the packaging of the shipment did not comply with IATA 5.0.2.6.1.3 and 5.0.2.8., not having sufficient closure, ullage, or absorbent material. The shipment is being held for an FAA investigation.
